titles.title: Inclusion of Alternative Approaches in Cancer Research Act
To require that the membership of advisory bodies serving the National Cancer Institute include individuals who are knowledgeable in complementary and alternative medicine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 6/9/1999--Introduced. Inclusion of Alternative Approaches in Cancer Research Act - Requires the membership of advisory bodies serving the National Cancer Institute to include one or more individuals who are knowledgeable in complementary and alternative medicine.
